sentences.pinyin: Tā dàduō shíjiān dōu zài gōngzuò.
sentences.translation: He is working for the most part of the time.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然这个任务很难，但我们大多数时候都能成功完成。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然這個任務很難，但我們大多數時間都能成功完成。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán zhè gè rènwù hěn nán, dàn wǒmen dàduōshù shíjiān dōu néng chénggōng wánchéng.
sentences.translation: Although the task is hard, we can complete it successfully for the most part of the time.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ dà duōshù shíjiān zài jiā.
sentences.translation: I spend most of my time at home.

sentences.simplifiedText: 大多数情况下，他都选择用公交而不是开车来回工作。
sentences.traditionalText: 大多數情況下，他都選擇用公車而不是開車來回工作。
sentences.pinyin: dà duōshù qíngkuàng xià，tā dōu xuǎnzé yòng gōngjiāo ér bú shì kāichē láihuí gōngzuò.
sentences.translation: In most cases, he chooses to take the bus rather than drive to work.

sentences.pinyin: Tāmen dà duōshù dōu shì xuéshēng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 这个地方的人大多数都是从其他城市迁移过来的。
sentences.traditionalText: 這個地方的人大多數都是從其他城市遷移過來的。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège dìfāng de rén dà duōshù dōu shì cóng qítā chéngshì qiānyí guòlái de.
sentences.translation: Most people in this area have moved from other cities.
